structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 132, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 4, effective July 14, 1992; ch. 211, sec. 13, effective July 14, 1992; and ch. 435, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 331, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 178, sec. 2, effective January 1, 1977.
